Classes
Class
Description
Booking
A model class to represent the bookings.
Client
This is a subclass of the User class.
DbController
Singleton class to manage the database connection.
DBManager
The DBManager class is the main controller to interact with the database.
GUIcontroller
This class is the GUI controller for the JavaFX view MainView.java .
MainView
It is the View class of the MVC architecture.
MessageService
A service class to translate messages into the desired language.
Room
This class represents the rooms.
Staff
This is a subclass of the User class.
User
This is a superclass to make more specific classes such as the Client class and the Staff class.
